/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out prominently.
